Events.OnCreate:
(block (enemyStations) (switch ; Get a list of enemy stations in the region. If we cannot find any ; suitable targets then we don't have a mission. (not (setq enemyStations (append (sysFindObject Nil "TAE +sapiensCompound;") (sysFindObject Nil "TAE +sungSlaveCamp;") (sysFindObject Nil "TAE +marauderCompound;") ))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission (block (targetObj) ; Pick a random enemy station to destroy (setq targetObj (seededRandom (objGetDestiny aOwnerObj) enemyStations))
; Remember it (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID targetObj))
; Register for events so we know when the target is destroyed (msnRegisterForEvents gSource targetObj) ) ) )

Language.Text:
Your mission is to destroy %targetName% in %systemName%.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: %payment%

You are at Commonwealth Militia Headquarters. The officer of the watch looks up from his displays:
"Are you looking for a mission, captain?"
"%TargetName% is hiding among the outer asteroids. We want you to go out there and destroy it. Clear?"
Language.String: "We've uploaded the coordinates of the target to your computer. Good luck, captain!"
"Why don't you make yourself useful and get us some tea or something."
"You haven't completed your mission! Don't return until you have!"
"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!"
"Well done! You dealt with that threat expertly."
